thread.title: A new BlackBerry tablet might kick off second phase of software licensing
thread.title_full: A new BlackBerry tablet might kick off second phase of software licensing

author: James Nieves
title: A new BlackBerry tablet might kick off second phase of software licensing
text:
BlackBerry CEO John Chen spoke with candor this morning on the earnings call about the next phase in BlackBerry's licensing strategy. In particular, he mentions one of the company's partners is very excited to build a tablet based on Android.

BlackBerry CEO John Chen spoke with candor this morning on the earnings call about the next phase in BlackBerry's licensing strategy. In particular, he mentions one of the company's partners is very excited to build a tablet based on Android. He clarifies this is part of an expansion phase of the software licensing program.
